alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 8:55AM EDT until August 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...From this morning to late Thursday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise and crest at or around 18.5 feet Wednesday morning. - Action stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. The next statement will be issued this afternoon.
